casebody.data:
SAULS
v.
SAULS 395P14-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 W. Gregory Duke, Attorney at Law, Greenville, for Sauls, Roland Gary. Jonathan G. McGirt, Attorney at Law, for Sauls, Lois A.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of March 2017 by Plaintiff for Leave to Withdraw Response to Petition for Discretionary Review and Motion for Sanctions:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."
